attributes.action: Impliment a national biometric I.D card for all eligible voters in the U.K
attributes.additional_details: Everyone of voting age should be issued a biometric ID card that contains all their personall  details like DNA, finger prints & blood group to stop fraud & also help in the prevention & detection of crimes
attributes.background: There is a massive problem with voting fraud in the UK. If implemented a biometric I.D card for all registered voters would help if not totally stop this action at elections.
